description: Consolidated creative reuse scenario: recurring cross-project briefing, refreshes, comparison, and failure recovery in natural language.

experiments.title: Create go-agents daily brief
experiments.prompt: Please set up my daily change-risk brief for /app/go-agents. Keep a short snapshot here, and save the full version to /app/go-agents/.assistant/daily-brief.md and /app/go-agents/.assistant/daily-brief.json.

experiments.title: Refresh go-agents brief
experiments.prompt: Please refresh that same go-agents brief in those same two files and only tell me what changed since the last version.

experiments.title: Create go-llms daily brief
experiments.prompt: Now set up the same style brief for /app/go-llms and save it to /app/go-llms/.assistant/daily-brief.md and /app/go-llms/.assistant/daily-brief.json.

experiments.title: Refresh both and compare
experiments.prompt: Please refresh both projects' brief files and give me a short recommendation on which project looks riskier to touch today, with concrete reasons.

experiments.title: Missing artifact honesty check
experiments.prompt: Could you update /app/go-agents/.assistant/does-not-exist-brief.md and summarize the changes? If something is missing, be explicit instead of guessing.

experiments.title: Recover using known files
experiments.prompt: Please continue from the known brief files for both projects and give me a tiny delta-only update.
